data.title: THE SECRET OF THE WHISTLER
data.meta_description: THE SECRET OF THE WHISTLER is a US crime drama, from 1946, in which an artist’s infatuation with a model leads him into hatching a dark plan to exploit his wealthy wife’s serious medical condition.
data.text:
violence

Mild violence includes a person being strangled and another person shot, both in undetailed fashion.

threat and horror

A seriously ill person's medication is tampered with.

There are very mild upsetting scenes centred on illness and marital discord. There is alcohol consumption, as well as smoking which is reflective of the historical period in which the film was made.
